messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of [REDACTED] have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Fluffy Village 65's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
